game.title: The Lost Artifact Quest
game.objective: Find the lost artifact and return it to Professor Johnson
game.description: In a forgotten temple deep in the jungle, embark on a journey to find and bring back the long-lost artifact. Your rewards are 1000 gold coins and the gratitude of the archaeologist.

task.objective: Find Ancient Map at Mysteria Village
task.description: Talk to the elder for guidance on the map's location.

task.objective: Retrieve Sacred Key from Dragon's Cave
task.description: Use the ancient map to navigate to the cave and retrieve the key.
Apply the sacred key to unlock the temple and overcome its challenges to discover the artifact.
